title: Looking for a Duo Partner in BRONZE NOT DIAMOND
body:
Hello

I'm quite lonely when playing league, especially when playing ranked
SO PLS, if your in bronze and you want to play ranked PLEASE ADD ME!

Btw I'm bronze 3.
Also I do all lanes! (Don't do well on ADC tho)
Also pref chick, idm dudes, but you know, got to learn to interact with opposite gender :P

TY 4 REPLYING (if anyone does)

replies.body: let me boost u f g t

wanna get outta bronze don't play with girls. there is literally one girl player i know that is any good and the rest should stick to been lux / support mains in gold.

their are a few that are good but at the end of the day they are casual because they have lifes, gg

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3dZVkNkF,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-29T01:52:31.236+0000)
>
> there is literally one girl player i know that is any good

Was that Straawbella?
Hey, im silver atm just got out of bronze and would love to help you go further in lol and duo, add me IGN: jezzajomo1 :)
Going to add both of you, any readers feel free to add me too :)
